attributes.action: Ensure Driving Lessons & Testing doesn't go into any more lockdowns/restrictions
attributes.additional_details:
The waiting time for a driving test in a major city is going to be approx 1 year after lockdown 2.

Learners will reluctantly book tests in areas they don't live near - increasing their costs.

10k instructors (Out of 40k) have left the industry because of Covid-19 causing lesson prices sour by £3-5 for 1hr making it less affordable because supply & demand has changed.

Over 1 million driving tests have been cancelled this year.

A driving licence increases job opportunity for peoples future.
attributes.background:
Driving Lessons & Driver Training falls under education. The government has promoted education & training should continue.
Driving lessons needs to continue for the future of economy & reduce the long term spread of the virus. The waiting time for a driving test is approaching 1 year in most areas.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462

We also haven't been able to verify the figures you cite in your petition, and wouldn't be able to publish a petition that contained false or unproven statements.
